v1.76.question: What new features are included in Comfyroll Studio version v1.76?
v1.76.answer: CR VAE Decode, CR Combine Prompt and CR Diamond Pattern were added.

v1.75.1.question: What issues were addressed in Comfyroll Studio version v1.75.1?
v1.75.1.answer: Issue 112 with CR Text Blacklist was fixed, adding handling for blank lines and fixing the problem with finding multiple keywords. In addition, PR108 fixed a missing import in 'nodes_utils_text.py'.
v1.75.1.subject: Comfyroll Studio

v1.75.question: What was added to Comfyroll Studio in version v1.75?
v1.75.answer: CR Half Drop Panel was added.

v1.74.1.question: What was the fix in Comfyroll Studio version v1.74.1?
v1.74.1.answer: The issue with the CR Thumbnail Preview show_help was fixed.

v1.74.question: What updates were made to Comfyroll Studio in version v1.74?
v1.74.answer: CR Simple Image Compare was updated to automatically resize the second image if the size is different. New nodes, CR Aspect Ratio For Print and CR Seamless Checker, were added. A node to select ISO Size, CR Select ISO Size, was also added.

v1.73.1.question: What was fixed in Comfyroll Studio version v1.73.1?

v1.73.question: What are the updates in Comfyroll Studio version v1.73?
v1.73.answer: CR String to Boolean was added, and CR Aspect Ratio Social Media was updated with more options. CR Color Tint was updated to fix a color issue.

v1.72.question: What were the features added in Comfyroll Studio version v1.72?
v1.72.answer: CR Select Resize Method and CR Set Switch From String were added.

v1.71.1.question: What were the fixes in Comfyroll Studio version v1.71.1?
v1.71.1.answer: Issues 101 (CR Select Font) and 103 (CR Overlay Transparent Image) were fixed.

v1.71.question: What change was made to text util nodes in Comfyroll Studio version v1.71?
v1.71.answer: The output of string outputs was changed to any_type.
